comment_text: Great article! I never realized AI could have such a big impact on healthcare.
I have some concerns about the use of AI in healthcare, particularly around privacy and data security. What measures are being taken to address these issues?
As a healthcare professional, I'm excited to see how AI can be used to improve patient outcomes and streamline processes.
I'm excited to see how blockchain can be used in healthcare to improve data sharing and patient outcomes.
I'm still not convinced that blockchain is the best solution for some of these use cases. What are the alternatives?
As a supply chain manager, I see huge potential for blockchain to improve transparency and reduce fraud.
I miss the social aspect of working in an office, but overall I think remote work is the way of the future.
As a manager, I've found that remote work has actually increased productivity for my team.
